name: CrimsonBubble
description:
CrimsonBubble is a game about playing as a bubble that can shoot out and absorb mini-bubbles. Absorb too many and you'll pop!

The objective is to gain as many points as possible by proving yourself in our endless Battle Arena game mode. Survive waves of enemy bubbles to increase your score, but beware! Many dangers exist for a bubble in the deep ocean. Rocks, coral, seaweed, and even fish can instantly mean the end of the road for your crimson bubble.

This game was created in July 2021 for Mini Jam 84: Bubbles. The selected limitation was "You are your own ammo."

The team:

Programmers - willowed, Barret, Damon, Pringle, Max

Artists - bUMSNUG, Mellyn.

Game Designer - qweny.

Composers - Scotty Rich, Socks.
